entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:48 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 09:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 4 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
